mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Claims there is no news to report because everyone in America is "electioneering"; the King of England is recovering; proposes that an American in Rome was premature in claiming that George Washington was re-elected President.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: George III, King of Great Britain, 1738-1820
Washington, George, 1732-1799
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1789 March 16, Paris, [France] to [William] Short, n.p.
